pkgmetadata.longdescription: # st-chatStreamlit Component, for a Chat-bot UI, [example app](https://share.streamlit.io/ai-yash/st-chat/main/examples/chatbot.py)authors - [@yashppawar](https://github.com/yashppawar) & [@YashVardhan-AI](https://github.com/yashvardhan-ai)## InstallationInstall `streamlit-chat` with pip```bashpip install streamlit-chat ```usage, import the `message` function from `streamlit_chat````pyimport streamlit as stfrom streamlit_chat import messagemessage("My message") message("Hello bot!", is_user=True) # align's the message to the right``` ### Screenshot![chatbot-og](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/90775147/210397700-5ab9e00d-a61b-4bc9-a34a-b5bd4454b084.png)
